GOOS=<OS> GOARCH=<ARCH> go build -ldflags '-X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.Version=<VERSION> -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.KubeVersion=v1.30.4 -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.ImagePrefix=image-prefix' -o ./bin/<OS>/<ARCH>/kwok ./cmd/kwok
cp ./bin/<OS>/<ARCH>/kwok kwok-<OS>-<ARCH>
gh -R ghrelease release upload <VERSION> kwok-<OS>-<ARCH>
GOOS=<OS> GOARCH=<ARCH> go build -ldflags '-X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.Version=<VERSION> -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.KubeVersion=v1.30.4 -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.ImagePrefix=image-prefix' -o ./bin/<OS>/<ARCH>/kwokctl ./cmd/kwokctl
cp ./bin/<OS>/<ARCH>/kwokctl kwokctl-<OS>-<ARCH>
gh -R ghrelease release upload <VERSION> kwokctl-<OS>-<ARCH>
